text: @GovernorTomWolf @PAHealthDept I know someone who was admitted to a PA hospital, tested for covid, tested negative, was determined to have a kidney infection, and still released as a coronavirus positive.... all because of self-admission to a hospital, the number goes up.. statistics are heavily inflated.
